backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with all core data types for incidents, messages, evidence, police submissions, summaries, and place lookup structures.
backend/police-department.mo: Defines the PoliceDepartment type containing basic department contact and address fields.
backend/stalker-profile.mo: Defines the StalkerProfile type with personal, location, vehicle, and social media fields.
feature_evidence.json: Specifies feature evidence entries mapping features to impacted files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing component behavior and implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables, dark mode values, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file setting PWA metadata, icons, titles, and linking the application root and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, description, colors, icons, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling pre-caching, runtime caching, activation cleanup, fetch strategy, and skip-waiting messages.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, profile setup, main content rendering, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/CrimeHelp.tsx: Renders an educational page with cards explaining legal rights, crime definitions, and external resources. Includes visuals, icons, and a link opener to womenslaw.org.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai. Includes a heart icon styled with primary colors.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the app header with branding, login/logout handling via Internet Identity, and a light/dark theme toggle. Shows user profile initials when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/IncidentDetail.t: Shows detailed incident information including messages, evidence, stalker data, and police department lookup. Supports generating messages, viewing evidence, and selecting or saving police departments.
frontend/src/components/IncidentForm.tsx: Form for creating or supplementing an incident report with fields, validation, file uploads, and optional stalker profile association. Handles evidence upload progress and report type selection dialogs.
Fetches and displays the user’s list of incidents with loading and error states, allowing selection to open the full incident detail view. Supports optional auto-selection via props and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/InstallationGuid: File exists but contains no content.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveSumma: Displays a user’s compiled incident summary with loading, error, and empty states, formatting dates and tone intensities for presentation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows the login screen with branding, feature descriptions, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Provides the main authenticated app layout with tabs for victim info, stalker info, reports, history, and evidence sections.
frontend/src/components/MaleUserWarningM: Placeholder component with no current implementation.
frontend/src/components/MessageGenerator: UI for generating contextual warning or documentation messages based on tone and intensity selections for a specific incident.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Renders a list of generated messages with metadata and actions like copy, share, and SMS sending.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalVide: Empty placeholder component with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/components/PoliceReportDial: Dialog for assembling and submitting a police report with selectable evidence, victim info options, summaries, and disclaimer acknowledgement.
frontend/src/components/PoliceSubmission: Displays a history of police submission logs, including timestamps, success status, narratives, and attached evidence details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple form allowing the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Handles showing a PWA install prompt, including deferred Android prompts and iOS home‑screen instructions, with logic for dismissals and install state.
frontend/src/components/SavedStalkerProf: Manages viewing, editing, loading, and deleting saved stalker profiles with dialogs and form controls.
frontend/src/components/StalkerRecord.ts: Main interface for creating or editing stalker information, managing saved profiles, and handling police department search and selection.
frontend/src/components/VictimProfile.ts: Renders a form for viewing and editing optional victim profile fields, syncing data with backend via save and fetch hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Derives actor readiness state from React Query cache, reporting readiness, initialization, or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity lifecycle.
Custom hook that persists state to localStorage, syncing changes automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, stalker, victim, and incident-related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom theme definitions including color variables and utility classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/types.ts: Re-exports backend type definitions and enums for consistent frontend typing.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrorMessage: Provides standardized user-friendly error messages for actor initialization and maps errors to readable descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/src/utils/waitForActorReady.ts: Polls React Query’s actor queries until they finish loading, error out, or timeout to avoid initialization race conditions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, breakpoints, animations, container settings, and loading typography, container-query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, revert goals, branding/icon requirements, issues, and feature request metadata.
